articles.title: China to reopen border Jan. 8, requiring only negative COVID test - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: On-arrival PCR tests, quarantine to be scrapped; 'orderly' outbound travel to resume
articles.content:
HONG KONG -- China will reopen its border to international travelers on Jan. 8, after the country made an abrupt U-turn on its COVID-19 containment policies earlier this month.

articles.title: 'I've found someone I love more than I love myself': Son Ye-jin shares first photo of newborn son - AsiaOne
